item.title: DAL
item.description: score:53 Chances: Delta Air Lines (DAL) has seen year-to-date gains and is expected to benefit from the resilience of the consumer in the travel industry. The strength of airline operators is being supported by customer loyalty programs and stability in fares, potentially leading to upside in revenues.
